backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister handling submissions, payments, authorization, and urgency slot logic with storage and time-based resets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their purpose within the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation describing features, flow, configuration steps, and deployment notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, routing between form/payment/confirmation flows, and admin panel display.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin-only table component showing all submissions with payment details, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Shows a non-blocking warning banner when backend connectivity fails, hidden while checking or if reachable.
Handles lead capture input, validation, submission via actor, and displays connectivity and error states.
frontend/src/components/OfferDetails.tsx: Displays Canva Pro offer details with pricing, discount, and feature list.
frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmat: Shows a confirmation message and next steps after successful payment.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSection.t: Displays payment QR/link and lets users confirm payment, updating backend and slot data.
frontend/src/components/UrgencyBanner.ts: Fetches and displays remaining urgency slots, showing a loading indicator while fetching.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads environment config and constructs a backend actor with proper host and root key handling.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines static payment configuration including UPI link, amount text, and product description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectivit: Performs a lightweight backend connectivity check using a simple actor query and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook to fetch all submissions from the backend actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useUrgencySlots.ts: React Query hook that retrieves remaining urgency slots from the backend and refetches every 10 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Utilities for normalizing and logging backend/actor errors into structured, user-friendly formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts specified query parameters from the browser URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project architecture, features, known issues, and versioned state for a lead capture and payment flow system.
